title: Universe/Geometry/Elevation
description: Elevation [rad] of a frame point from a ground station point/axes observer (by default the same name is used for the observation point and axes in frame system, e.g. ground station point)

target.description: Target, a point in the frames system

observer.description: Observer, the name both a point and an axes in the frames system

axes.description: Axes in which the observation is made, an Axes in the frames system (default, same as observer)

stations.description: Stations database to be used from stations plugin
